name: CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicCircularOpenGaugeRangeText
desc: A template for displaying text inside an open gauge, with leading and trailing text for the gauge.

items.name: init(gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider, leadingTextProvider: CLKTextProvider, trailingTextProvider: CLKTextProvider, centerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider)
items.desc: Creates a new template that has an open circular gauge with leading and trailing text, and a center text element.

items.name: var centerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display in the center of the gauge.

items.name: var gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider
items.desc: The gauge to display in the complication.

items.name: var leadingTextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display on the leading edge of the gauge.

items.name: var trailingTextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display on the trailing edge of the gauge.
